(Module 
  (SimpleStatement 
    (ExpressionStatement 
      (AugmentedAssignment 
        (Token) 
        (ExpressionList 
          (Expression 
            (PrimaryExpression 
              (Identifier "a")))) 
        (ExpressionList 
          (Expression 
            (PrimaryExpression 
              (Integer "1"))))))) 
  (SimpleStatement 
    (ExpressionStatement 
      (AugmentedAssignment 
        (Token) 
        (ExpressionList 
          (Expression 
            (PrimaryExpression 
              (Identifier "b")))) 
        (ExpressionList 
          (Expression 
            (PrimaryExpression 
              (Integer "2"))))))) 
  (SimpleStatement 
    (ExpressionStatement 
      (AugmentedAssignment 
        (Token) 
        (ExpressionList 
          (Expression 
            (PrimaryExpression 
              (Identifier "c")))) 
        (ExpressionList 
          (Expression 
            (PrimaryExpression 
              (Integer "1"))))))))
